snippet: The Andy Warhol Museum in Pittsburgh and the Museum of Modern Art are working together, hoping to lift Warhol’s film work to the level of his other art.
abstract: Andy Warhol Museum in Pittsburgh and Museum of Modern Art, which holds Warhol's film archives, are working together on project to digitize the materials, vast undertaking that curators and historians hope will, for first time, put Warhol's film work on par with his other work; project will be MoMAs largest effort to digitize work of single artist in its collection.
lead_paragraph: The Andy Warhol Museum in Pittsburgh and the Museum of Modern Art are working together, hoping to lift Warhol’s film work to the level of his other art.

headline.main: Digitizing Warhol’s Film Trove to Save It
headline.print_headline: Digitizing Warhol’s Film Trove to Save It
